name: Uniboom - War of Unicorns
description:
This is a 3D-Tower-Defense-Game with a basic combat system, but a lot of upgradeable possibilities. You can upgrade your towers in the Magical-science shop in the mainmenu (permanent upgrades) and within a game you have 2 possibilities to  upgrade your defenders.
The defenders are magical creatures based on an unicorn-setting.

The game has a story-modus with 10 Levels and an endless mode with 4 level. It comes with a playable tutorial or you're just looking at the "help"-sheets. The tutorial is just based on the standard-tower-defense-things.
